object.name: StarAmount
object.description: Describes an amount of Telegram Stars.
object.rst_description: Describes an amount of Telegram Stars.

annotations.description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars, rounded to 0; can be negative
annotations.html_description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars, rounded to 0; can be negative
annotations.rst_description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars, rounded to 0; can be negative
annotations.name: amount

annotations.description: The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars; from -999999999 to 999999999; can be negative if and only if amount is non-positive
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars; from -999999999 to 999999999; can be negative if and only if amount is non-positive
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars; from -999999999 to 999999999; can be negative if and only if *amount* is non-positive
annotations.name: nanostar_amount
